name: Orbit (itch) (Wuppos)
description:
Orbit

Congratulations! You finished your basic theory training, which means you finally get to go on your first space flight! Today we will learn how to mine asteroids and how to keep your ship in orbit. Good luck!

  • A 2D space simulator, with only one powerful thruster. Can you master the tricky controls?
  • Prove your skills by putting your ship in a stable orbit around a planet!
  • Mine asteroids and sell them to regain your fuel.

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 49 gamejam!
